author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Make the signature the same, to avoid warnings with PHP 5.3.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Fixed bug #12152: The SQLite's unixTimestamp() expression function
implementation uses the current UTC offset, instead of the UTC offset that
belongs to the date for which a Unix timestamp should be generated.

author: ts:ez.no
msg: - Fixed RFC test cases (no LOCK support so far) and added affected test cases
in their original to currently unsupported test cases.

author: dr:ez.no
msg: - Reset the $_GET and $_SERVER after the tests, so that other tests that rely
on them keep working.  This is necessary to make the ConsoleTools tests run

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Fixed a test which breaks without gmp or bcmath.
